nodes.text: Chris Corbould (born 1958) is a veteran British special effects coordinator who has worked on many blockbuster films, including eleven James Bond films. Corbould was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects for his work on The Dark Knight (2008) and won the award for his work on Inception (2010).
Corbould served as special effects supervisor for the 2015 film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. He was nominated for an Oscar for his work.
